DOC.brief_summary: This study examine Ready Drink ( RTD ) supplement .
DOC.detailed_description: This study examine short-term ( 7 day ) characteristic ingest Ready Drink ( RTD ) supplement immediately prior exercise blood , heart rate , blood pressure self-reported side effect .
DOC.criteria: Participants apparently healthy recreationally active male female age 18 40 Participants 18 year old 40 year old Participants history treatment metabolic disease ( i.e. , diabetes ) , hypertension , hypotension , thyroid disease , arrhythmias and/or cardiovascular disease Participants currently use prescription medication ( birth control allow ) Participants pregnant lactate female plan become pregnant within next month Participants history smoking Participants drink excessively ( 12 drink per week ) Participants recent history creatine supplementation within 8 week start supplementation
